allow: Bash(for file in ClinicFlowFeatures.tsx ClinicFlowFinalCTA.tsx ClinicFlowHowItWorks.tsx ClinicFlowProblems.tsx ClinicFlowTestimonials.tsx)

Bash(do sed -i "s|<div className=""absolute inset-0 bg-\[url(''/grid.svg'')\] opacity-[0-9]*"" />|<div className=""absolute inset-0"" style={{ backgroundImage: ''linear-gradient(rgba(255,255,255,0.05) 1px, transparent 1px), linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.05) 1px, transparent 1px)'', backgroundSize: ''50px 50px'', opacity: 0.05 }} />|g" "$file")
